TopicTitle: Manoeuvre nodes missing from new .90 career

Articles.Content:
I don't seem to be able to access the maneuver nodes on new career games they appear fine on sandbox but when I click on the flight path of my spaceship during career game I only get information about my craft and no node?

what gives, is this something I now have to unlock? Or is it a bug?

Edited December 17, 2014 by Squishy1901
Answered
Upgrade your tracking station, and PRESTO! You will have maneuver nodes. Or is it two upgrades? Anyway, that's how you get them.

Vanamonde is partly correct, you will have to upgrade the tracking station to tier 2 (once) but you will also have to upgrade the Mission control building once as well (Previously know as "Jeb's Junkyard") hope this helps :3

~Andy0432
